thank_you.delay_message_content: Currently, it is still very busy. Because of this it may take some time before our Customer Service can answer your question(s). click here to visit our FAQ.
thank_you.delivery_content: Estimated delivery time after payment is completed.
thank_you.delivery_payed_text: We've received your payment. Now your order will be processed, packed, and shipped to you as soon as possible
thank_you.delivery_unpayed_text:
You'll receive a confirmation email with payment instructions. After we've received your payment, your order will be processed and shipped to you as soon as possible.
Please note: it might take some time before you receive the email.
thank_you.multiple_parcels_content: Your order will be sent in multiple parcels, and you'll receive multiple tracking numbers
thank_you.payment_intro_text: To complete your order, please make sure you complete the payment.
thank_you.special_delivery_content: Due to the size of this product, normal delivery isn't available. After you've placed your order, the carrier will contact you within 2-9 working days to schedule delivery
thank_you.step_1: You'll receive an order confirmation with payment instructions.
thank_you.step_2: Once we've received your payment, your order will be prepared for shipping and we'll send you a track & trace code by email.

newsletter.details: *Minimum order value is £100. Discount is only valid on vidaXL branded products. vidaXL respects your privacy. You can unsubscribe at any time.

newsletter.double_opt_title: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!
newsletter.placeholder: Sign up and receive a £5 discount

newsletter.success_title: You will now start receiving our newsletters!

newsletter.unsubscribe_question: Anything else you'd like to share?
newsletter.unsubscribe_reason_1: The information in this newsletter isn't relevant for me.
newsletter.unsubscribe_reason_3: I receive too many newsletters in general, and that's why I never have time to read the vidaXL newsletter.
newsletter.unsubscribe_reason_4: I have a new email address and I unsubscribed for my old email address.
newsletter.unsubscribe_reason_5: I receive too many newsletters in general, and that’s why I never (have time to) read the vidaXL newsletter.
